short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create SEO-optimized and plagiarism-free content quickly with our advanced Ai writer using Google Search / Google News.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With ZeitPub, you can create SEO-optimized and plagiarism-free content quickly with our advanced Ai writer using Google Search / Google News.

1. Open a Google search page or a news coverage in Google News.

2. Click on ZeitPub extension to wake up the Ai to do the job.

3. Pick the output languages and hit generate. Sit back and relax.
